final_production_data.ticker: UK MAN ARRESTED OVER TESLA THREAT
final_production_data.main_heading: Tesla Threat Leads to Arrest in UK
headlines: Man arrested for allegedly threatening Tesla employee over parking dispute
Suspect faces charges of making threats to kill
Investigation ongoing, more details to follow
final_production_data.tts_script: A man in the UK was arrested on suspicion of making threats to kill a Tesla employee after a parking dispute at a supercharger station. The suspect faces charges of making threats to kill and an investigation is ongoing.

original_raw_news.original_title: A man in the UK was arrested for allegedly threatening to kill a Tesla employee over a parking dispute
original_raw_news.original_summary: A man in the UK was arrested on suspicion of making threats to kill a Tesla employee after a parking dispute at a supercharger station.
